CustomField.description: Overall status of a vehicle check performed in Pre Departure Check, Drop Trailer, or Return Vehicle jobs.
CustomField.formula: IF(OR(TEXT(Truck_Check_Status__c) ='Critical Issue', TEXT(A_Trailer_Check_Status__c)='Critical Issue', TEXT(B_Trailer_Check_Status__c)='Critical Issue'),'Failed - Critical Issue', IF(OR(TEXT(Truck_Check_Status__c) ='Non Critical Issue', TEXT(A_Trailer_Check_Status__c)='Non Critical Issue', TEXT(B_Trailer_Check_Status__c)='Non Critical Issue'),'Passed - Non Critical Issue', 'Passed'))
CustomField.label: Check Status
